story: You find yourself in a dimly lit, abandoned laboratory deep within the gang stronghold. The air is thick with the smell of burnt wiring and ozone. In the center of the room, you notice an old, rickety workbench covered in various tools and gadgets. A large, cylindrical device sits atop the workbench, emitting a low hum.

actions.action: Attempt to repair the cylindrical device
actions.good: Your skills with electronics prove valuable as you successfully repair the device, granting you access to a hidden cache of valuable items.
actions.bad: Your attempt to repair the device triggers an electrical overload, causing sparks to fly everywhere and dealing damage to your body.

actions.action: Search the workbench for useful tools
actions.good: You find a few useful gadgets on the workbench, including a multi-tool that will come in handy later. Your search pays off.
actions.bad: As you search the workbench, you accidentally knock over a container of chemicals, causing them to spill everywhere and dealing damage to your body.

actions.action: Investigate the source of the hum
actions.good: You discover that the hum is coming from a hidden compartment in the wall, which contains a valuable item. Your curiosity reaps rewards.
actions.bad: As you investigate the source of the hum, you trigger a security system, causing the room to fill with smoke and dealing damage to your body.
